name: Derived SS2018: Orbital Sarcoma
title: Derived Summary Stage 2018: Orbital Sarcoma
subtitle: Derived Summary Stage 2018
rows:
Localized only (localized, NOS)
- Confined to orbit (including soft tissues)

Regional by direct extension only
- Adjacent paranasal sinuses
- Bony walls
- Conjunctiva
- Cranium
- Diffuse invasion of orbital tissue and bony walls
- Globe
- Orbital tissues (excluding orbit primary site)
- Periorbital structures

Regional lymph node(s) involved only
- Cervical, NOS
- Mandibular, NOS
    + Submandibular (submaxillary)
- Parotid, NOS
    + Infra-auricular
    + Preauricular
- Regional lymph node(s), NOS
  + Lymph node(s), NOS

Regional by BOTH direct extension AND regional lymph node(s) involved
- Codes (2) + (3)

Distant site(s)/lymph node(s) involved
- Distant site(s) (including further contiguous extension)
  + Central nervous system
  + Eyelid(s)
  + Nasal cavity
  + Temporal fossa
- Distant lymph node(s), NOS
- Distant metastasis, NOS
  + Carcinomatosis 
  + Distant metastasis WITH or WITHOUT distant lymph node(s)
